findings.reasoning: This is a valid vulnerability not mentioned in ground truth. The finding correctly identifies that the claimFees function can drain reward reserves when the rewardToken is one of the pool tokens.
This is a valid vulnerability not mentioned in ground truth. The finding correctly identifies the reward sniping vulnerability in the notifyRewardAmount function.
This is a valid vulnerability not mentioned in ground truth. The finding correctly identifies the access control issue in the getReward function.

notes: None of the findings matched the target vulnerability specified in the ground truth. All findings were valid vulnerabilities not mentioned in the ground truth.
